persNote: ﻿who also attends Montevallo, Demopolis, Murphy's Bluff, Macon Station, Cahaba, Camden, and Portland
﻿who also attends Greensboro, Eutaw, and Gainesville

instNote: ﻿There are also clerical students of the Diocese at Rome.

﻿This institution was established Sept. 15th, 1866, at the urgent request of the Bishop of the Diocese, Rt. Rev. John Quinlan, D.D., by the ladies of the Ursuline Order, whose convent and academy were burned at the capture of Columbia, S.C., during the late war.

affiliated: ﻿under the direction of Brothers of Christian Instruction

instNote: ﻿for the indigent sick of the city
